attributes.action: Reject the bombing of Syria, due to it being disastrous and ill thought out.
attributes.additional_details: We must oppose this, any attempted bombing of Syria shall result in British citizens being put at a hugely costly risk, this also is beyond party politics it is a matter of security and absolutely paramount to the future of innocent people whose deaths can be avoided. We must all unite, from across the party spectrum. I don't care if you're right wing, left wing, authoritarian or libertarian you all know in your hearts and minds that bombing in Syria will mean being subjugated to more horrors.
attributes.background: I am an admin on the biggest and fastest growing political debating platform known as "British Politics." I have run campaigns before, but none are as important as this. Which is why I am extending a hand of friendship to all those who would oppose the disastrous plan of bombing Syria.
